about_the_game:
This Explorer’s Pack is packed full of fabulous beverages. Share them with mercenaries in Taverna and they’ll fight for you in Endless World!

The Explorer’s Pack includes:

- 10 cups of Shimmering Sundew: able to summon mercenary with 3 star or above
- 3 cups of Heavenly Haze: able to summon mercenary with 4 star or above
- 1 cup of Midnight Moon: able to summon mercenary with 5 star

Please restart the game to collect DLC content by clicking “dlc” button on top of the main screen.
detailed_description:
This Explorer’s Pack is packed full of fabulous beverages. Share them with mercenaries in Taverna and they’ll fight for you in Endless World!

The Explorer’s Pack includes:

- 10 cups of Shimmering Sundew: able to summon mercenary with 3 star or above
- 3 cups of Heavenly Haze: able to summon mercenary with 4 star or above
- 1 cup of Midnight Moon: able to summon mercenary with 5 star

Please restart the game to collect DLC content by clicking “dlc” button on top of the main screen.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
